type.title: package type
type.description: Descriptive name of the type of package: RubyGem, Python Wheel, Java Jar, Debian package, etc.

oneOf.title: package version
oneOf.description: Version of the package. Package types may implement specific handling for versions but this is always serialized as a string.

oneOf.title: Primary programming language
oneOf.description: Primary programming language of the package, such as Java, C, C++. Derived from the package type: i.e. RubyGems are primarily ruby, etc.

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Description for this package i.e. a long description, often several pages of text

oneOf.title: size
oneOf.description: size of the package download in bytes

oneOf.title: release date
oneOf.description: Release date of the package

oneOf.title: parties
oneOf.description: A list of party objects. Note: this model schema will change soon.

items.title: party
items.description: A party is a person, project or organization related to a package.

oneOf.title: party type
oneOf.description: the type of this party: One of: person, project, organization

oneOf.title: url
oneOf.description: URL to a primary web page for this party.

oneOf.title: party role
oneOf.description: A role for this party

oneOf.title: email
oneOf.description: Email for this party.

oneOf.title: keywords
oneOf.description: A list of keywords or tags.

oneOf.title: homepage URL
oneOf.description: URL to the homepage for this package

oneOf.title: Download URL
oneOf.description: A download URL for this package.

oneOf.title: Download checksums
oneOf.description: A list of checksums for this download

oneOf.title: bug tracking URL
oneOf.description: URL to the issue or bug tracker for this package

oneOf.title: code view URL
oneOf.description: a URL where the code can be browsed online

oneOf.title: Version control system tool
oneOf.description: The type of VCS tool for this package. One of: git, svn, hg, bzr, cvs

oneOf.title: VCS Repository URL
oneOf.description: a URL to the VCS repository in the SPDX form of:git+https://github.com/nexb/scancode-toolkit.git

oneOf.title: VCS revision
oneOf.description: a revision, commit, branch or tag reference, etc. (can also be included in the URL)

oneOf.title: Copyrights
oneOf.description: Copyright statements for this package. Typically one per line.

oneOf.title: asserted license
oneOf.description: The license as asserted by this package as a text.

oneOf.title: license expression
oneOf.description: license expression: either resolved or detected license expression

oneOf.title: notice text
oneOf.description: notice text

oneOf.title: dependencies
oneOf.description: An object mapping a dependency group to a list of dependency objects for this package. Note: the schema for this will change soon.The possible values for dependency grousp are:runtime, development, optional, test, build, continuous integration, bundled

oneOf.title: related packages
oneOf.description: A list of related_package objects for this package. For instance the SRPM source of a binary RPM.

type.title: type
type.description: Descriptive name of the type of package: RubyGem, Python Wheel, Java Jar, Debian package, etc.

oneOf.title: version
oneOf.description: Version of the package
